build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libclang-dev clang curl && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y --default-toolchain 1.87.0 && . $HOME/.cargo/env && mkdir -p bin && WORKDIR=$(pwd) && for dir in /app /workspace /railway "$WORKDIR" "$(dirname "$WORKDIR")" "$(dirname "$(dirname "$WORKDIR")")"; do [ -f "$dir/Cargo.toml" ] && cd "$dir" && break; done && [ -f Cargo.toml ] && cargo build --release -p mys-faucet && cp target/release/mys-faucet crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && cp target/release/merge_coins crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && cp crates/mys-faucet/setup-wallet.sh crates/mys-faucet/bin/ && chmod +x crates/mys-faucet/bin/setup-wallet.sh
